author: Joe Biden
content: The Symfony Yaml component implements a subset of the YAML specification. Specifically, it implements the minimum set of features needed to use YAML as a configuration file format.

author: Donald Trump
content: Multiply sea night grass fourth day sea lesser rule open subdue female fill which them Blessed, give fill lesser bearing multiply sea night grass fourth day sea lesser

author: Emilly Blunt
content: According to the official YAML website, YAML is “a human friendly data serialization standard for all programming languages”.

author: Donald Trump

author: Joe Biden
content: Quoted styles are useful when a string starts or end with one or more relevant spaces, because unquoted strings are trimmed on both end when parsing their contents. Quotes are required when the string contains special or reserved characters.

author: Emilly Blunt
content: Strings containing any of the following characters must be quoted. Although you can use double quotes, for these characters it is more convenient to use single quotes, which avoids having to escape any backslash

author: Donald Trump
content:
The double-quoted style provides a way to express arbitrary strings, by using \ to escape characters and sequences. For instance, it is very useful when you need to embed a 
 or a Unicode character in a string.

author: Joe Biden
content: When a string contains line breaks, you can use the literal style, indicated by the pipe (|), to indicate that the string will span several lines. In literals, newlines are preserved:

author: Emilly Blunt
content: Comments are ignored by the YAML parser and do not need to be indented according to the current level of nesting in a collection.

author: Donald Trump
content: A YAML file is rarely used to describe a simple scalar. Most of the time, it describes a collection. YAML collections can be a sequence (indexed arrays in PHP) or a mapping of elements (associative arrays in PHP).

author: Joe Biden

author: Emilly Blunt
content:
Use blank lines to separate block-level HTML elements like
, , 
, and 
 from the surrounding content. Try not to indent the tags with tabs or spaces — that can interfere with the formatting.

author: Joe Biden
content: For security reasons, not all Markdown applications support HTML in Markdown documents. When in doubt, check your Markdown application’s documentation. Some applications support only a subset of HTML tags.

author: Emilly Blunt
content: Many Markdown applications allow you to use HTML tags in Markdown-formatted text. This is helpful if you prefer certain HTML tags to Markdown syntax.
